Italy ranks 118th out of 139 countries in work efficiency and is 48th in industrial competitiveness.`` Not a cent from the two billion euros of profits forecast for 2010 will be generated in Italy, he said, pointing out that Fiat's 6,100 workers in Poland produce the same number of cars as the company's 22,000 auto workers in Italy.
